resources.string: Changes to this app will be applied on all devices linked with the same Samsung account.
"You're too young to use Customization Service."
Allow %s to use network connections and access the following data:
Data will be transferred in the background when the device is connected to a mobile network or WLAN.
After you agree to all of the above, this message will not be shown again.
Data related to frequently visited places
All usage data provided to Customization Service will be deleted from your phone and from Samsung storage. This data includes:
All usage data provided to Customization Service will be deleted from your phone and all Samsung servers. This data includes:
"All usage data provided to Customization Service will be deleted from your phone and from Samsung storage. This data can't be recovered. Deletion might take a while."
"All usage data provided to Customization Service will be deleted from your phone and all Samsung servers. This data can't be recovered. Deleting your data might take a while."
It may take up to 3 days for the request to be processed.
You can download your personal data collected by Samsung related to Customization Service.
Some data may not be erased if it is required by law to be retained. In these cases, your data will be erased immediately after the required retention period.
It may take up to 2 days for the request to be processed.
You can erase your personal data collected by Samsung related to Customization Service. All of your personal data will be erased or anonymized.
Customization Service improves your experience by personalizing your content in supported apps and services.
The latest version is already installed.
Allows an app to open Customization Service
Check your network connection and try again.
"You won't see personalized content related to the information."
To enjoy a better experience with personalized content for this app, allow the following personal information to be collected:
"This app can read your phone's context information for Personalization Service Client."
This app can read your personal preference information that is based on your phone usage.
The app will close when you update it. Save any unsaved data before updating.
A new version of Customization Service is available.
Select which information can be sent to Customization Service in order to provide you with a customized user experience.
Select which apps can use Customization Service to provide personalized data for an improved experience.
A new version of Customization Service is available.
Sign in to your Samsung account to use Customization Service.
Sign in to your Galaxy account to use Customization Service.
"This app can provide information about your phone's context to Rubin."
This app can provide information about your personal preferences.
